text: Nipponaphera quasilla is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Description== The shell size is 25 mm ==Distribution== This species is distributed along Somalia; Southern India and Southern Burma ==References== * Bouchet P. & Petit R.E. (2008). New species and new records of southwest Pacific Cancellariidae. The Nautilus 122(1): 1–18. Category:Cancellariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1987
title: Nipponaphera quasilla
